OnSplineModeChangedDelegate.description: An unknown type (likely an Unreal Engine or plugin type).

mSplineModeSelectHoldDownDurationForUI.description: Time needed to hold down the key to show the selection UI

mIsWaitingForSelectionUI.description: True if we are waiting for the selection UI

mIsUsingPressAndReleaseAsBuildSteps.description: user setting for if we are using the release and press mode or not for advancing build steps. Nett to be in sync on client and ser ver players preferences

mPendingRecipe.description: Recipe to activate when state is entered.

mUpgradedActor.description: The actor to replace (dismantle) when upgrading.

mProximateClearances.description: Contains all the proximate clearances volumes

mClearanceDetector.description: overlaps so the state does not contain this easily self contained logic.

mActionDelay.description: Time (in seconds) it takes for the action (eg. Build, dismantle)

mActionMessage.description: Text to show while action is in progress
